name: Formula 1 Masters
overview: You can try your hand at managing a Formula 1 team of your choice in this simulation. First of all you must choose your team and sign deals with drivers and engine and tyre suppliers, all from within your budget – pit crews must be hired and engine performance maximised within the remaining budget. Between races you must select tyre compounds and wing settings for the circuit, and can peruse championship standings and records. The races are depicted form a side-view of the cars completing the laps, with any position changes, retirements or changes in track conditions reported. You can call your drivers in for new tyres, although refuelling isn’t a feature.
